summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate movements, transfers, and administrative changes, including the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) to general population and his subsequent removal from general population, which occurred on the day before his death.

events.title: Epstein's Cell Movements Before Death
events.description: The log records inmate movements at MCC New York, including the transfer of inmate 76309-054 (Jeffrey Epstein) from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) cell Z06-217UAD to general population cell H01-001L at 08:38, and his subsequent 'PRE REMOVE' from general population cell H01-002L back to SHU cell Z06-218UAD at 20:11.

locations: General Population units (e.g., H01, Z06, G03)
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons daily log from MCC New York dated August 9, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It shows inmate 76309-054 (Epstein) was moved from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) to general population cell H01-001L in the morning (08:38).
Later that evening (20:11), the log records a 'PRE REMOVE' action, moving inmate 76309-054 from general population cell H01-002L back to the SHU cell Z06-218UAD.
The log details routine inmate movements, transfers, releases, and administrative changes for numerous inmates besides Epstein on that day.
The document provides a timestamped record of Epstein's location within the prison in the final 24 hours before his death.
